titles.title: Prince Congressional Gold Medal Act
Prince Congressional Gold Medal Act
A bill to posthumously award a Congressional Gold Medal to Prince Rogers Nelson in recognition of his achievements and contributions to the culture of the United States.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

bill.summary:
Prince Congressional Gold Medal Act
This bill provides for the award, posthumously, of a Congressional Gold Medal to Prince Rogers Nelson, better known as Prince, in recognition of his achievements as a musician and contributions to the culture of the United States.
